formatted_address: 10 Bayfront Avenue, Marina Bay Sands, The Shoppes, Level B2 Near Digital Light Canvas, Singapore 018956
name: Sands Lifestyle Counter (The Shoppes B2)

reviews.text:
This is the place you get your MBS physical membership card. This is also where you dispute missing transactions being added to your membership account. There are also counters for you to exchange for parking redemptions (but do it on your app, it's faster and cheaper).

The customer service folks are very nice and patient. Very helpful as well, as they helped us with our MBS Membership concerns really quickly.

It's located near to the Sands Theatre, Marquee side of the building. Closer to the Helix Bridge or the Art Science Museum. Right outside Sephora and Oakley, if you're still in need of a bearing.

Good experience getting the Sands LifeStyle membership complimentary upgrade. Staff Ronnie was quick with processing my upgrade, and also informed me of the various perks I will be entitled to, and he was also patient to ask me if I have any further questions.

Also, shout out to the other staff (gentlemen) standing near the queue for helping me check I had everything I needed before I got to the counter for my upgrade.

Staff, Sheila at the concierge near the Sampan ride area was busy communicating on some text messages with cartoon emoticons sent out. Definitely doesn't look like professional work going on the computer. Another staff, Alan was hostile towards our requirements and enquiry, merely hoping we leave the counter soon. Terrible experience. Worst customer service in Singapore.

At approx 10.30am, a trainee with spectacles at the counter opposite TWG ,basement one, took a great length of help by walking together with me to Origins + Bloom outlet  just to rectify on my dining credits.
Thank you for the great service.
Female staff at mrt concierge are bad at handling and resolving customers issue. Was asked to rejoin the queue when she couldnt answer my inquiry lol

vicinity: 10 Bayfront Avenue, Marina Bay Sands, The Shoppes, Level B2 Near Digital Light Canvas
